sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import { Button } from 'class101-ui';
import ControlGroup from './ControlGroup';
import Input from '../formInputs/Input';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"control-group"}}>{`Control Group`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Input을 Label로 묶어줍니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={ControlGroup} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<ControlGroup>
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
</ControlGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ControlGroup,Input}}>
  <ControlGroup>
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
    <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
  </ControlGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"block-control-group"}}>{`Block control group`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<ControlGroup block>
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
</ControlGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ControlGroup,Input}}>
  <ControlGroup block>
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
    <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
  </ControlGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"vertical-control-group"}}>{`Vertical control group`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<ControlGroup vertical>
  <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
  <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
</ControlGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ControlGroup,Input}}>
  <ControlGroup vertical>
    <Input placeholder="Placeholder text" />
    <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
  </ControlGroup>
</Playground></MDXTag>
